author: etnu
msg: First phase of support for relative urls for proxied rendering.
This does not yet address relative images, css, etc., but all other links within the gadget spec will resolve as relative.
The image issue is somewhat separate, and will be dealt with in the next patch.

author: midon
msg: Support Basic/Digest auth for external services

author: midon
msg: Support multiple property file for endpoint configuration.
